name: UnionKeyUsageAndKeyUsage
title: Union of WHO GDHCN Key Usage CodeSystem And WHO GDHCN Key Usage CodeSystem

concept.definition: A certificate which acts a trust anchor in the verification of the certificate chain for the DSCs issued by a Trust Network participant
A certificate which may be used to verify a digital signature within a Verfifiable Digital Health Certificate
A certificate which acts a trust anchor in the verification of the certificate chain for the DESCs issued by a Trust Network Participant
A certificate which may be used to initiate a secure data exchange connection (e.g. mTLS) between Trust Network Participants
Used for establishing (m)TLS connections with systems, in particular between the Trust Network Gateway and backend systems of a Trust Network Participant
Used to verify digital signature of cryptographically signed content uploaded to services within the Global Digital Health Certification Network, in particular the Trust Network Gateway
